subject: Dear Sir/Ma,
body:
Dear Sir/Ma,
               IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF YOUR LONG-DELAYED FUND
I am delighted to inform you that the Federal government has approved the immediate release of your fund.
The government gave the approval following the investigation carried out by this office. We discovered that your payment has been deliberately and unjustly delayed due to the selfish interests of some highly placed officials and their criminal collaborators.
You are here advised to see the attached letter for more information and instruction.
Yours sincerely,
 
Gerald Adams,
Secretary,
Office of the Special Adviser to the President on:
Information & Strategy.
Office of the Presidency.
Federal Republic of Nigeria.

subject: Re:   Dear Sir/Ma,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the update on the approval of my fund release by the Federal government. Could you please provide more details about the process and what steps I need to take next?

Best wishes,
Mary
